title: 'Quick Hits' With Andrew Luck (Ep. 99)
description:
The Ringer's Kevin Clark and Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck discuss his injured offseason (01:00), his NFL draft experience (06:00), athletes being politically active (11:30), and 'Game of Thrones' (14:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
